name: MYC_PATIENT_2
description: This table supplements the information contained in the MYC_PATIENT table. It contains one row for each web-based chart system account. The data contained in each row consists of basic account information and configuration.

columns.name: MYPT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the account record.

columns.name: HIDE_FINISHED_TASKS_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether finished tasks in the To Do activity should be hidden or not. A null value means the user has never set this preference.

columns.name: GOAL_MYCNOTE_ID
columns.description: WNO ID of the patient goals note. Only populated by the personal goals note type.
